snippet: Pets, cellphones, bikes, basketballs and artificial body parts are among the items pickup crews have retrieved from the tracks.
abstract: New York City transit worker crews are often called upon to recover items lost by passengers; workers have corralled collection of artificial body parts, scooped engagement rings from the rails and reunited children with stuffed animals; they say that rigors of job have multiplied, with smartphone proliferation and in-station Wi-Fi producing a more distracted ridership and sending more phones tumbling to the tracks.
lead_paragraph: Pets, cellphones, bikes, basketballs and artificial body parts are among the items pickup crews have retrieved from the tracks.

headline.main: Coming to the Rescue for Riders Who Drop Treasures on the Tracks
headline.print_headline: Coming to the Rescue for Riders Who Drop Treasures on the Tracks
